title: Microlearning Leadership Development Framework for Adult Learners Aged 40+

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental leadership concepts and understanding of mathematics education
context.additional_context: Optimizing and applying the 8 dimensions (career stage, vision competency, etc.) of the 4L framework to mobile environments for leadership development in mathematics education

learning_goals: Learners explain the eight dimensions of the 4L framework and apply them to mathematics education leadership
Learners design and execute leadership development projects using collaborative tools in mobile environments
Learners establish crisis management strategies and apply them to problem situations in mathematics education settings
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
